Praise a weekday

Source: R/weekday_praise.R
weekday_praise.Rd

Given a date, figure out which weekday it was, then write a positive message.

weekday_praise(date = Sys.Date())

Arguments

date

A base::Date object or a character() in a format that can be converted to a base::Date object with base::as.Date().

Value

Returns a character(1) with a message praising the weekday of the input date.

Examples


## Praise the current weekday
weekday_praise()
#> [1] "Tuesday: You are hunky-dory!"

## Praise the date we started teaching
weekday_praise("2024-06-09")
#> [1] "Sunday: You are epic!"

## Praise the current weekday in a reproducible way
set.seed(20240610)
weekday_praise()
#> [1] "Tuesday: You are wondrous!"

## Verify that it's reproducible
set.seed(20240610)
weekday_praise()
#> [1] "Tuesday: You are wondrous!"
